alert.note: Alert for Madison; Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 1:48PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN ONEIDA... MADISON...AND NORTHERN ONEIDA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 147 PM EST, a lake effect snow band was along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Forestport to near Clayville. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Utica, Rome, Oneida, Kirkland, Lee, Verona, Westmoreland, Vienna, Canastota, and Trenton. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 31 and 33. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
